issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Using Appcelerator Studio it is not able to install an application into android simulator as well as into android device. But iOS simulator works fine. Also older versions of Titanium Studio works fine with these projects

Android SDK and NDK are already uptodate and works fine on Titanium Studio
fields.summary: Appcelerator Studio: Unable to install on Android simulator or device
fields.environment:
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.1.201306061938
Titanium SDK version 3.1.1.v20130606121419
CLI version 3.1.1-cr
Mac OS X Version 10.7.5

comments.body: Closing ticket as the information that was requested was never provided.
